item.title: CVE-2023-32122|2024-09-25T14:38:19.701Z -- spiffy%20plugins -- spiffy%20calendar
item.description: Unauth. Reflected Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Spiffy Plugins Spiffy Calendar plugin <=Â 4.9.3 versions.

item.title: CVE-2024-43969|2024-09-17T22:33:52.313Z -- spiffy%20plugins -- spiffy%20calendar
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in Spiffy Plugins Spiffy Calendar allows SQL Injection.This issue affects Spiffy Calendar: from n/a through 4.9.12.
